    Subclasses of TextTransformer in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.transform
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ExpNum
     
    class 
    NeighDel
    The NeighDel class is a decorator that removes adjacent duplicates from the text, based on the specified condition.
    class 
    Reverse
    The Reverse class represents a text transformer decorator that performs a reverse transformation on the input text based on specified conditions.
    class 
    ShortcutMod
    The ShortcutMod class is a decorator for TextTransformer that can expand or compress specified shortcuts in the input text.
    class 
    ToLaTeX
    A decorator class that transforms text into LaTeX format.
    class 
    Transform
    The Transform class represents a text transformer that performs various transformations such as converting to uppercase, lowercase, or capitalizing the text.
